lines.gurmukhi: siqgur siq siqgur siq siq irdY iBdY n duqIAw Bwau qiRgun AqIq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Sati Satigur Sati Sati Ridai , Bhidai N Douteeaa Bhaau Trigoun Ateet Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: True Guru has eternal form. His teachings are also for ever. He is never ridden with duality. He is free of the three traits of mammon (Tamas, Rajas and Saty).

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn bHm gur purn srbmeI eyk hI Anyk myk skl ky mIq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Braham Gur Puran Sarabamaee , Ayk Hee Anayk Mayk Sakal Kay Meet Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Complete God Lord who is one and yet present in everyone, who is friend of everyone, manifests His form in True Guru, (Satguru).

lines.gurmukhi: inrbYr inrlyp inrwDwr inrlMB inrMkwr inribkwr inhcl cIq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Nirabair Niralayp Niraadhaar Niralanbha , Nirankaar Nirabikaar Nihachal Cheet Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: God-like True Guru is free of all animosity. He is beyond the influence of maya (mammon). He requires nobody's support, nor takes anyone's refuge. He is formless, beyond the grip of five vices and is ever stable of mind.

lines.gurmukhi: inrml inrmol inrMjn inrwhwr inrmoh inrByd ACl AjIq hY ]150]
lines.transliteration_english: Niramal Niramol Niranjan Niraahaara , Niramoh Nirabhayd Achhal Ajeet Hai ?150?

Shabad OS B.translation: God-like True Guru is free of dross. He cannot be evaluated. He is beyond the smudge of maya (mammon). He is free of all bodily needs like food and sleep etc; He has no attachment with anyone and is free of all differences. He tricks no one, nor can be tr
